Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http.SimpleHttpClient
    Use HttpClient instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http.SimpleHttpRequest
    Use HttpRequest or AggregatedHttpMessage instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http.SimpleHttpRequestBuilder
    Use HttpRequest or AggregatedHttpMessage instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.client.http.SimpleHttpResponse
    Use HttpResponse or AggregatedHttpMessage instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift.ThriftService
    Use THttpService instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.http.HttpHeaderNames.KEEP_ALIVE
    use HttpHeaderNames.CONNECTION "keep-alive"
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.http.HttpHeaderNames.PROXY_CONNECTION
    use HttpHeaderNames.CONNECTION "proxy-connection"
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware(ChannelFutureListener)
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware(FutureListener<T>)
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.makeContextAware(GenericFutureListener<T>)
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift.ThriftService.of(Object)
    Use THttpService.of(Object) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift.ThriftService.of(Object, SerializationFormat)
    Use THttpService.of(Object, SerializationFormat) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift.ThriftService.ofFormats(Object, SerializationFormat, Iterable<SerializationFormat>)
    Use THttpService.ofFormats(Object, SerializationFormat, Iterable) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift.ThriftService.ofFormats(Object, SerializationFormat, SerializationFormat...)
    Use THttpService.ofFormats(Object, SerializationFormat, SerializationFormat...) instead.
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.AbstractRequestContext.rejectPromise(Promise<?>, Throwable)
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.rejectPromise(Promise<?>, Throwable)
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.AbstractRequestContext.resolvePromise(Promise<?>, Object)
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.RequestContext.resolvePromise(Promise<?>, Object)
    com.linecorp.armeria.common.util.Exceptions.traceText(Throwable)
    Use Throwables.getStackTraceAsString(Throwable).
